trans-unit.source: What’s new in the latest update to Azure Search | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: What’s new in the latest update to Azure Search | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Release notes for Azure Search describing the latest updates to the service
trans-unit.target: Release notes for Azure Search describing the latest updates to the service

trans-unit.source: What’s new in the latest update to Azure Search
trans-unit.target: What’s new in the latest update to Azure Search

trans-unit.source: Azure Search is now generally available, offering a 99.9% availability service-level agreement (SLA) for supported configurations of the [2015-02-28 version of the API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn798935.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Azure Search is now generally available, offering a 99.9% availability service-level agreement (SLA) for supported configurations of the [2015-02-28 version of the API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn798935.aspx).

trans-unit.source: How features are versioned and rolled out
trans-unit.target: How features are versioned and rolled out

trans-unit.source: Features are released separately or jointly through the [REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn798935.aspx), [.NET SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=528216), or the service dashboard in the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com).
trans-unit.target: Features are released separately or jointly through the [REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn798935.aspx), [.NET SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=528216), or the service dashboard in the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com).

trans-unit.source: Both the .NET library and REST APIs have multiple versions.
trans-unit.target: Both the .NET library and REST APIs have multiple versions.

trans-unit.source: Older APIs remain operational as we roll out new features.
trans-unit.target: Older APIs remain operational as we roll out new features.

trans-unit.source: You can visit [Search service versioning](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn864560.aspx) to learn more about our versioning policy.
trans-unit.target: You can visit [Search service versioning](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn864560.aspx) to learn more about our versioning policy.

trans-unit.source: .NET SDK 0.10.0-preview
trans-unit.target: .NET SDK 0.10.0-preview

trans-unit.source: This is the second iteration of the .NET client library, Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll.
trans-unit.target: This is the second iteration of the .NET client library, Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll.

trans-unit.source: This version adds support for creating, managing, and using Indexers via .NET classes.
trans-unit.target: This version adds support for creating, managing, and using Indexers via .NET classes.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, for Azure SQL Indexers, there is new support for indexing geography points.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, for Azure SQL Indexers, there is new support for indexing geography points.

trans-unit.source: Indexers Class
trans-unit.target: Indexers Class

trans-unit.source: DataSource Class
trans-unit.target: DataSource Class

trans-unit.source: .NET SDK 0.9.6-preview
trans-unit.target: .NET SDK 0.9.6-preview

trans-unit.source: **Released: 2015 March 5**
trans-unit.target: **Released: 2015 March 5**

trans-unit.source: This is the first public release of the .NET SDK for Azure Search.
trans-unit.target: This is the first public release of the .NET SDK for Azure Search.

trans-unit.source: It includes a client library, Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll, with two namespaces:
trans-unit.target: It includes a client library, Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll, with two namespaces:

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.Azure.Search
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.Azure.Search

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models

trans-unit.source: Excludes:
trans-unit.target: Excludes:

trans-unit.source: [Indexers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=528173) (this feature is no longer excluded in the 0.10.0-preview version)
trans-unit.target: [Indexers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=528173) (this feature is no longer excluded in the 0.10.0-preview version)

trans-unit.source: Management REST API
trans-unit.target: Management REST API

trans-unit.source: [2015-02-28-Preview](search-api-2015-02-28-Preview.md) features (currently, preview-only features consist of Microsoft natural language processors and `moreLikeThis`).
trans-unit.target: [2015-02-28-Preview](search-api-2015-02-28-Preview.md) features (currently, preview-only features consist of Microsoft natural language processors and `moreLikeThis`).

trans-unit.source: Visit [How to use Azure Search in .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=528088) for guidance on installation and usage of the SDK.
trans-unit.target: Visit [How to use Azure Search in .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=528088) for guidance on installation and usage of the SDK.

trans-unit.source: Api-version 2015-02-28-Preview
trans-unit.target: Api-version 2015-02-28-Preview

trans-unit.source: **Released: 2015 April 22**
trans-unit.target: **Released: 2015 April 22**

trans-unit.source: Indexers now support fieldMapping constructs that provide field assignments when actual field names are different between the external database and the Azure Search index.
trans-unit.target: Indexers now support fieldMapping constructs that provide field assignments when actual field names are different between the external database and the Azure Search index.

trans-unit.source: See [Indexers](search-api-indexers-2015-02-28-Preview.md) for the `2015-02-28-preview` version of the indexers documentation..
trans-unit.target: See [Indexers](search-api-indexers-2015-02-28-Preview.md) for the `2015-02-28-preview` version of the indexers documentation..

trans-unit.source: Also in this preview update, indexers now support field type transformations so that you can map a string field in a SQL table to a string collection field in a search index, assuming the source field represents a JSON array.
trans-unit.target: Also in this preview update, indexers now support field type transformations so that you can map a string field in a SQL table to a string collection field in a search index, assuming the source field represents a JSON array.

trans-unit.source: Released: 2015 March 5
trans-unit.target: Released: 2015 March 5

trans-unit.source: [Microsoft natural language processors](search-api-2015-02-28-Preview.md) bring support for more languages and expansive stemming for all the languages supported by Office and Bing.
trans-unit.target: [Microsoft natural language processors](search-api-2015-02-28-Preview.md) bring support for more languages and expansive stemming for all the languages supported by Office and Bing.

trans-unit.source: [moreLikeThis=](search-api-2015-02-28-Preview.md) is a search parameter, mutually exclusive of `search=`, that triggers an alternate query execution path.
trans-unit.target: [moreLikeThis=](search-api-2015-02-28-Preview.md) is a search parameter, mutually exclusive of `search=`, that triggers an alternate query execution path.

trans-unit.source: Instead of full-text search of `search=` based on a search term input, `moreLikeThis=` finds documents that are similar to a given document by comparing their searchable fields.
trans-unit.target: Instead of full-text search of `search=` based on a search term input, `moreLikeThis=` finds documents that are similar to a given document by comparing their searchable fields.

trans-unit.source: Api-version 2015-02-28
trans-unit.target: Api-version 2015-02-28

trans-unit.source: **Released: 2015 March 5**
trans-unit.target: **Released: 2015 March 5**

trans-unit.source: [Indexers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=528210) is a new feature that vastly simplifies indexing from data sources on Azure SQL Database, Azure DocumentDB, and SQL Server on Azure VMs.
trans-unit.target: [Indexers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=528210) is a new feature that vastly simplifies indexing from data sources on Azure SQL Database, Azure DocumentDB, and SQL Server on Azure VMs.

trans-unit.source: [Suggesters](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn798936.aspx) replaces the more limited, type-ahead query support of the previous implementation (it only matched on prefixes) by adding support for infix matching.
trans-unit.target: [Suggesters](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn798936.aspx) replaces the more limited, type-ahead query support of the previous implementation (it only matched on prefixes) by adding support for infix matching.

trans-unit.source: This implementation can find matches anywhere in a term, and also supports fuzzy matching.
trans-unit.target: This implementation can find matches anywhere in a term, and also supports fuzzy matching.

trans-unit.source: [Tag boosting](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=528212) enables a new scenario for scoring profiles.
trans-unit.target: [Tag boosting](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=528212) enables a new scenario for scoring profiles.

trans-unit.source: In particular, it leverages persisted data (such as shopping preferences) so that you can boost search results for individual users, based on personalized information.
trans-unit.target: In particular, it leverages persisted data (such as shopping preferences) so that you can boost search results for individual users, based on personalized information.

trans-unit.source: Visit [Azure Search is now Generally Available](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=528211) for the service announcement on the Azure blog that discusses all of these features.
trans-unit.target: Visit [Azure Search is now Generally Available](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=528211) for the service announcement on the Azure blog that discusses all of these features.

trans-unit.source: Api-version 2014-10-20-Preview
trans-unit.target: Api-version 2014-10-20-Preview

trans-unit.source: **Released: 2014 November, 2015 January**
trans-unit.target: **Released: 2014 November, 2015 January**

trans-unit.source: [Lucene language analyzers](search-api-2014-10-20-preview.md) was added to provide multi-lingual support for the custom language analyzers distributed with Lucene.
trans-unit.target: [Lucene language analyzers](search-api-2014-10-20-preview.md) was added to provide multi-lingual support for the custom language analyzers distributed with Lucene.

trans-unit.source: Tool support was introduced for building indexes, including scoring profiles, in the [Azure management portal](https://portal.azure.com).
trans-unit.target: Tool support was introduced for building indexes, including scoring profiles, in the [Azure management portal](https://portal.azure.com).

trans-unit.source: Api-version 2014-07-31-Preview
trans-unit.target: Api-version 2014-07-31-Preview

trans-unit.source: **Released: 2014 August 21**
trans-unit.target: **Released: 2014 August 21**

trans-unit.source: This version was the public preview release for Azure Search, providing the following core features:
trans-unit.target: This version was the public preview release for Azure Search, providing the following core features:

trans-unit.source: REST API for index and document operations.
trans-unit.target: REST API for index and document operations.

trans-unit.source: The majority of this API version is intact in 2015-02-28.
trans-unit.target: The majority of this API version is intact in 2015-02-28.

trans-unit.source: The documentation for version `2014-07-31-Preview` can be found at [Azure Search Service REST API Version 2014-07-31](search-api-2014-07-31-preview.md).
trans-unit.target: The documentation for version `2014-07-31-Preview` can be found at [Azure Search Service REST API Version 2014-07-31](search-api-2014-07-31-preview.md).

trans-unit.source: Scoring profiles for tuning search results.
trans-unit.target: Scoring profiles for tuning search results.

trans-unit.source: A scoring profile adds criteria used to compute search scores.
trans-unit.target: A scoring profile adds criteria used to compute search scores.

trans-unit.source: The documentation for this feature can be found at [Azure Search Service Scoring Profiles REST API Version 2014-07-31](search-api-scoring-profiles-2014-07-31-preview.md).
trans-unit.target: The documentation for this feature can be found at [Azure Search Service Scoring Profiles REST API Version 2014-07-31](search-api-scoring-profiles-2014-07-31-preview.md).

trans-unit.source: Geospatial support has been available from the beginning, provided through the `Edm.GeographyPoint` data type that has been part of Azure Search since its inception.
trans-unit.target: Geospatial support has been available from the beginning, provided through the `Edm.GeographyPoint` data type that has been part of Azure Search since its inception.

trans-unit.source: Provisioning in the preview version of the [Azure management portal](https://portal.azure.com ).
trans-unit.target: Provisioning in the preview version of the [Azure management portal](https://portal.azure.com ).

trans-unit.source: Azure Search was one of the few services that has only been available in the new portal.
trans-unit.target: Azure Search was one of the few services that has only been available in the new portal.

trans-unit.source: Management api-version 2015-02-28
trans-unit.target: Management api-version 2015-02-28

trans-unit.source: **Released: 2015 March 5**
trans-unit.target: **Released: 2015 March 5**

trans-unit.source: [Management REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn832684.aspx) marks the first version of the management API belonging to the generally available release of Azure Search.
trans-unit.target: [Management REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn832684.aspx) marks the first version of the management API belonging to the generally available release of Azure Search.

trans-unit.source: There are no feature differences between the earlier preview and this one.
trans-unit.target: There are no feature differences between the earlier preview and this one.

trans-unit.source: Management api-version 2014-07-31-Preview
trans-unit.target: Management api-version 2014-07-31-Preview

trans-unit.source: **Released: 2014 October**
trans-unit.target: **Released: 2014 October**

trans-unit.source: The preview release of [Management REST API](search-management-api-2014-07-31-preview.md) was added to support service administration programmatically.
trans-unit.target: The preview release of [Management REST API](search-management-api-2014-07-31-preview.md) was added to support service administration programmatically.

trans-unit.source: It is versioned independently of the service REST API.
trans-unit.target: It is versioned independently of the service REST API.
